banner_text: Upgrade now for a loyalty discount on the TV you love
package_1_header: Upgrade now and get our exclusive entertainment channels and shows
package_1_yellow_banner: Your BT TV loyalty discount - save £36 over 18 months
package_1_sales_message: Record shows and enjoy more choice with a bunch of extra channels
package_1_bp_1: Watch the latest channels and shows with our 20 premium channels
package_1_bp_2: Record up to 300 hours of your favourite telly
package_1_bp_3: Pause and rewind live TV with our recordable YouView+ box
package_1_bp_4: Catch up on the latest channels on the go with the BT TV app
package_1_bp_5: Buy and rent the latest films and box sets on the BT TV Store
package_1_legals:
Entertainment TV Pack.

Prices and content may change at any time during the contract. Separate contracts apply to BT Broadband, BT TV and BT Sport.

BT TV 18 month minimum term. £9.00 a month. Currently £11.00 a month from month 19. You'll need BT Broadband. Existing broadband customers must have 18 months remaining on your contract, if not, you'll need to re‐contract your broadband. Availability of digital channels and quality of content depends on local transmitter and suitable rooftop aerial (www.freeview.co.uk/availability). £20 charge for broadband extenders, if necessary. HDMI connection required. Payment by direct debit. Minimum line speed required to watch the live AMC channel and BT Sport. A 10m cable will be provided.

Loyalty Discount ‐ Save £36 over 18 months compared to the standard monthly price.

Together we can reduce paper consumption.

© British Telecommunications plc 2019. We're registered in England at 81 Newgate Street, London EC1A 7AJ (company number 1800000). All information and prices were correct at time of printing, February 2019.

© 2019 Twentieth Century Fox Home Entertainment LLC. All Rights Reserved.
